properties.name: app.aop.audit.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable AOP audit logging aspect. When enabled, methods annotated with @Auditable will log audit information including operation details, parameters, and results.

properties.name: app.aop.performance.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable AOP performance monitoring aspect. When enabled, methods annotated with @ExecutionTime will be monitored for execution time and performance metrics.

properties.name: app.aop.validation.enabled
properties.description: Enable or disable AOP parameter validation aspect. When enabled, methods annotated with @ValidateParameters will automatically validate their input parameters.

properties.name: app.aop.validation.fail-fast
properties.description: Configure validation behavior to fail fast. When true, validation stops at the first error found. When false, all parameters are validated and all errors are collected.

properties.name: app.aop.validation.validate-email-format
properties.description: Enable email format validation in the validation aspect. When enabled, string parameters will be validated against email regex pattern if they contain '@' symbol.
